name: Word Runner
description:
From the creator of Apollo Null (nominated for Best Educational Game at the Danish Game Awards 2017) comes Word Runner!

Word Runner is half infinite runner, half word game. Use your letters to make words, but hurry before hitting the wall. Literally.

– Make words with more and more letters. First 3, then 4, then 5 and then... 

– Keep your calm as the speed increases.

– Use the intuitive swipe interface to get in the zone.

– Create free-form avant garde percussion jazz while you play.

– Choose your color theme to match your mood.

– More than 100.000 words and conjugations in the dictionary to choose from.
